revision.text: ==Central Huasteca Nahuatl== ===Noun=== {{head|nch|noun}} # [[soap]]. ---- ==Central Nahuatl== ===Noun=== {{head|nhn|noun}} # [[soap]]. [[Category:Tlaxcala Central Nahuatl]] ---- ==Northern Puebla Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|ncj|es|jabón}}. ===Noun=== {{head|ncj|noun}} # {{l|en|soap}} ===References=== * {{R:Brockway et al. 2018|page=242}} ---- ==Tetelcingo Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== Borrowed from {{bor|nhg|es|jabón}}, from {{der|nhg|la|sapo}}. ===Noun=== {{head|nhg|noun}} # [[soap|Soap]]. ===References=== * {{cite-book|last=Brewer|first=Forrest|last2=Brewer|first2=Jean G.|title=Vocabulario mexicano de Tetelcingo, Morelos|edition=segunda impresión|location=México, D.F.|publisher=Instituto Lingüístico de Verano|year=1962|year_published=1971|page=245}}
